tests.name: Super Quick Test
tests.description: A test that completes almost instantly.

tests.name: Test Simple Event Wait
tests.description: Checks if waitForEvent correctly pauses and resumes on a custom event.

tests.name: Config Load and Item Check Test
tests.description: Tests loading rules configuration, adding items to inventory, and checking location accessibility based on item requirements.

tests.name: Library Location Accessibility Test
tests.description: Verifies that Library region and location accessibility are properly separated. Expected: Library region reachable, Library location unreachable.

tests.name: Location Panel Basic Functionality
tests.description: Tests basic functionality of the Location Panel including UI elements and data loading.

tests.name: Events Panel Sender/Receiver Display
tests.description: Verifies that modules appearing as both senders and receivers are correctly displayed in the Events panel

tests.name: Events Panel Module Name Tracking
tests.description: Verifies that the Events panel correctly tracks module names and enable/disable functionality works

tests.name: Library Exit Accessibility Test
tests.description: Verifies that the Library exit shows correct accessibility status, specifically testing the fix for region/location name conflicts.

tests.name: Exit Panel Basic Functionality
tests.description: Tests basic functionality of the Exit Panel including UI elements and data loading.

tests.name: Simple Path Analyzer
tests.description: Very simple test to isolate Path Analyzer issues without state manager.

tests.name: Debug Path Analyzer
tests.description: Simple debug test to isolate Path Analyzer issues.

tests.name: Path Analyzer - Panel Test
tests.description: Opens the Path Analyzer panel and selects a region to analyze.

tests.name: Path Analyzer - Library Test
tests.description: Tests Path Analyzer with Library region (no parentheses).

tests.name: Path Analyzer - Misery Mire (Entrance) Test
tests.description: Tests Path Analyzer with Misery Mire (Entrance) region (with parentheses).

tests.name: Path Analyzer UI - Library Test
tests.description: Tests Path Analyzer UI interaction with Library region (no parentheses).

tests.name: Debug Path Analyzer Library Paths
tests.description: Debug test to check actual DOM structure for Library paths

tests.name: Path Analyzer UI - Misery Mire (Entrance) Test
tests.description: Tests Path Analyzer UI interaction with Misery Mire (Entrance) region (with parentheses).

tests.name: Test Spoilers Panel - Full Run
tests.description: Activates the Test Spoilers panel, loads the suggested log, runs the full test, and reports the result.

tests.name: Library Region Accessibility Test (Show All)
tests.description: Verifies that Library region shows as accessible while Library location shows as inaccessible using "Show All Regions" mode.

tests.name: Library Region Accessibility Test (Navigation)
tests.description: Verifies that Library region shows as accessible while Library location shows as inaccessible using Move button navigation.

tests.name: Region Panel Basic Functionality
tests.description: Tests basic functionality of the Region Panel including UI elements and data loading.

tests.name: Show Paths Checkbox
tests.description: Tests the Show Paths checkbox functionality for hiding/showing the full region path.

tests.name: Region Move Event Dispatch
tests.description: Tests that clicking Move buttons dispatches user:regionMove events.

tests.name: Entrance Display
tests.description: Tests that region entrances are displayed with proper formatting and accessibility.

tests.name: Region Move Event Handler Toggle
tests.description: Tests the ability to toggle the regions module event handler for user:regionMove events through the Events panel.

tests.name: Region Move Complete Flow
tests.description: Comprehensive test of region move functionality including event dispatch, state updates, and UI changes.
